pakshayakata wada pudgala charitha ismathuwimen hatagath manapa kramaya matha godanaguna thrada deshapalana sanskruthiya awasan kirima, chandadayakaya ha deshapalakaya athara kittu sambandhathawayak godanagima, suluthara deshapalana kandayam walatada salakiya yuthu niyojanayak labadima ha merata shrama balakaye bahuthara panguwa wana kanthawata prayogikawa deshapalanaya thula niyojanayak labadima, nawa mathiwarana kramaya hadunwadime mulika aramunu athara idiriyenma sadahan wiya.

panas dewaniwaratath lankawe simasahitha eksath prawruththi pathra samagama(lekhawus) magin mihinthala aaloka pujawata samagamiwa mewarath sidu karanu labana kathika tharagaya heta(31) perawaru 8.30ta mihinthalaya maha widyalayadi pawathwe.mihinthala raja maha wiharadhipathi walawahanguna wawe dhammarathana nahimiyange anushasakathwayen lekhawus aayathanaye sabhapathi ha kalamanakarana adhyaksha jyeshta madhyawedi bandula padmakumara,lekhawus aayathanaye meheyum adhyaksha ha janadhipathi sambandhikarana lekam upul disanayaka , lekhawus aayathanaye alewi ha shakha karyala pradhani sunil sendanayaka yana mahathwarunge meheya wima meya sidu kere.

ema mahatha dina hatharak pura awasan deshana idiripath kara thibe. 2014 wasare pebarawari masa 01 wanada 2015 wasare janawari masa 19 dakwa kalasimawa thula litro gas samagamata rupiyal miliyana 500ka mudalak kanwil holdin samagama haraha helanko hotel and spa samagame aayojanaya kirima thulin rajaye mudal sawadya lesa pariharanaya kala bawata chodana karamin gamini senarath mahatha athulu withthikaruwan siwu denakuta erehiwa nithipathiwaraya wisin mema naduwa gonukara thibini.ෙ siddhiyata adala nadu wibhagaya awasanwimen pasu nil bandara hapuhinna namathi withthikaru withthiye sakki kandawimakin thorawa nidahas kirimata thripudgapa wishesha mahadhikaranaya pasugiya da niyoga kaleya.

heta (27) madhyama rathri 12 sita 2018 adhyapana podu sahithaka pathra samanya pela wibhagayata adalawa, wibhagaya awasan wana desambar masa 12 dinaya dakwa sampurna kalaya thula siyalu upakaraka panthi thahanam kara thibena bawata niwedanayak nikuth karamin shri lanka wibhaga departhamenthuwa me bawa sandahan kara atha.
ewani hinganun piri aanduwa ada wana wita gas kapa, bhumiya wikuna, naya gena rata ma walapallata yawa atha.

me madhyama prathipadawa hewath aarya ashtangika margaya nuwana namathi asa wiwara karawana sulu ekak.nuwana laba dena ekak, keles sansindawana ekak, gambaurin danaganimata upakari wana ekak, mana awabodhayata hethu wena ekak, thanhawa pradhana keles nathi kirimata hethu wena ekak washayen dakwa aththe mehi athi lokoththara paththa wisthara karadimatayi.ee anuwa budupiyanan wahanse ge me dharmaya thula thibena wismitha helidarawwak wanne me niwana kara meheyawana lokoththara aarya ashtangika margayayi.mehidi api laukika marganga wisthara karana athara apa ge wishesha awadhanaya yomu wenne lokoththara paththatayi.ese wuwath apa tharaye awadharanaya kara gatha yuthu karyaya wanne laukika anshayen me aarya ashtangika margaya gana kisidu danumak, awabodhayak nathi thanaththata, ema margayehi gaman nokala thanaththata lokoththara anshaye diyunuwak salasa ganimata kisidu awakashayak nathi bawayi.
apawath wi wadala shri lanka ramanynya maha nikaye anunayaka athipuchaniya girambae aananda himiyanta amamaha niwansuwa pathami.
